about_the_game:
Set within a rich, sprawling fantasy universe, the world of 5th Dimension is unlimited in scale and is created by the community of players who populate it. Use an in-depth world-building interface to build, and own, part of the 5th Dimension game-world.

Within your world, design high-tech robotic humanoids called Mechs that you control to compete in an array of high-intensity competitions, ranging from deathmatch shootouts to hi-octane racing.

Battle for the glory of your faction to gain wealth and power and expand your influence over 5th Dimension as you compete for control of a virtual world like no other.

BUILD AN EMPIRE

The virtual world of 5th Dimension is a rich, expansive universe filled with untold technological wonders and captivating natural beauty. From the lush, teeming forests of the island of Indu to the massive, sparkling edifices of the metropolis of Studio City, 5th Dimension’s magic and beauty is defined both by its violent contrasts and its alluring harmony.

The 5th Dimension World Builder offers a rich, city-building and terraforming interface empowering players to transform landmass and build beautiful, detailed landscapes and urban settlements, ranging from sparse rural outposts to sky-scraping metropolises. The creation of new terrain expands the world-map of 5th Dimension, resulting in it growing organically over time, offering a game-space that is limited only by imagination. Create venues within the cities you have built, and finally, assemble guilds. Use your Guild to play co-op, unlocking story elements and embarking on factional quests that offer rich rewards and perilous adventure.

YOUR WORLD YOUR WAY

During early access, community members will be empowered to create the buildings and architecture within the major cities that exist on the 5 islands within the game-world, using the 5th Dimension World Builder. These buildings, created by players, can then be used for regular gameplay and to host Esports events, incorporating the spaces and places that they create into the player experience of the fully featured game.

This unique approach allows players to craft, and own, a personalized piece of the 5th Dimension game-world, and to actively participate in the life and activity of the game when it is launched. Players will be rewarded when their creations are included in 5th Dimension - not only will you own part of the virtual world, but you are compensated for your work. Following Early Access, the economy features will be fully revealed, allowing for higher levels of access, encouraging the community to continue expanding the game-world of 5th Dimension.

BATTLE FOR SUPREMACY

Within the virtual world of 5th Dimension, players compete in an array of team based competitions to earn units of in-game currency called 'Dimens'. Spend Dimens to advance player characters, unlock new skills & abilities, and expand your control - unlocking ever greater power to expand and reshape the world around you.

Dimens are primarily earned through completing quests and participating in, or hosting, Esports events known as 'Battles'. Battles pit players against each other in PVP competitions that exist within 5 distinct gameplay formats:

Sky Running - Control your Mech in-flight and fight off the competition in a breakneck race to the finish line within a low gravity arena filled with explosive obstacles.

Rhythmex - Beat-powered rhythm battles where players ride waves of percussive energy in time to the music in order to win.

Skate Or Fly - Big air skate comps with mechs designed for maximum agility to perform feats of airborne daring that no human ever could.

Hyperdrive -  Adrenaline fuelled drag racing and inner city urban street racing.

Thudd Rumble - Bring your A game and go head to head with opposing faction members in a no holds barred, ‘last mech standing’ combative battle for supremacy.

Players participate in these battles by controlling high tech robotic humanoids known as 'Mechs'. Mechs are A.I. powered, virtual beings designed by players using our Mech Builder. Develop your Mech using a varied specialization pathway, focusing on 4 key functions - Agility, Flight, Muscle & Power. Blend these abilities in a myriad of ways to build the Mech you need for the specific battle you are taking on, and leave your opponent no chance for victory.

BECOME A CITIZEN OF 5TH DIMENSION

We’re inviting anyone interested in building a virtual world like no other to join our community by becoming a citizen of 5th Dimension during early access. Sign up for beta access to the 5th Dimension world builder and get involved as a player, world builder or content creator. Join the conversation on Discord to find out more.

name: 5th Dimension
short_description: 5th Dimension is a sci-fi world builder and RPG MMO that empowers players to create, and then control a limitless virtual world. Build environments, design high-tech robotic humanoids and compete in an array of adrenaline fuelled competitions to exert your influence on the world you’ve built.
